name: Eirika
desc:
The princess of the Kingdom of
Renais. She's elegant and kind.

name: Seth
desc:
A young commander of Renais.
He's calm, composed, and skilled.

name: Franz
desc: An earnest and compassionate cavalier from Renais.

name: Gilliam
desc: An armoured knight from Frelia. He's quiet yet dependable.

name: Vanessa
desc: A sincere, honest, and honourable pegasus knight of Frelia.

name: Moulder
desc: A mature priest of Frelia. He's gentle and reassuring.

name: Ross
desc: A young villager. He longs to be a warrior, like his father.

name: Garcia
desc: A villager from Renais. He was once a feared military leader.

name: Neimi
desc: A childhood friend of Colm who hails from Renais. She cries a lot.

name: Colm
desc: A childhood friend of Neimi who hails from Renais. He can be snide.

name: Artur
desc: A young monk from Renais. He is a very forthright and pious man.

name: Lute
desc: A young mage of Renais. She believes she is a prodigy.

name: Natasha
desc: A beautiful cleric from the Grado Empire. She's graceful and serious.

name: Joshua
desc: A wandering sword fighter from Jehanna. He loves to gamble.

name: Ephraim
desc: The prince of Renais. He is a man of great honour and bravery.

name: Forde
desc: A cavalier from Renais. He is skilled, but reckless. He's Franz's brother.

name: Kyle
desc: A steadfast and honourable cavalier in sworn service to Renais.

name: Orson
desc: A cavalier of Renais. He's a devoted husband and a serene and quiet man.

name: Tana
desc: A young lady of Frelia. She is both cheery and sociable.

name: Amelia
desc: A young girl from a small village in Grado. She is honest and sincere.

name: Innes
desc: The prince of Frelia. He's brash and arrogant, but good at heart.

name: Gerik
desc: A mercenary leader from Jehanna. He's better known as the Desert Tiger.

name: Tethys
desc: A beautiful and charming dancer from Jehanna.

name: Marisa
desc: An aloof sword fighter from Jehanna. She's known as the Crimson Flash.

name: L'Arachel
desc: A young woman from Rausten. She fights for justice and honour.

name: Dozla
desc: A berserker from Rausten. He's a hearty man with a thirst for life.

name: Saleh
desc: A sage from the village Caer Pelyn. He's Ewan's solemn, but kind, teacher.

name: Ewan
desc: A sage-in-training from Jehanna. He reveres his teacher, Saleh.

name: Cormag
desc: A wyvern knight of Grado. A gentle man, but a ferocious warrior.

name: Rennac
desc: A lazy, greedy, but exceptional fighter from the Republic of Carcino.

name: Duessel
desc: A courageous general in Grado's army. He's better known as Obsidian.

name: Knoll
desc: One of Grado's royal mages. He knows the riddle of the Dark Stone.

name: Syrene
desc: The dutiful commander of the 3rd battalion of Frelia's pegasus knights.

name: Myrrh
desc: A young, pure-hearted girl from the Darkling Woods. She tends to be shy.

name: O'Neill
desc: A troop leader in Grado's army.

name: Breguet
desc: Commander of a Grado military force.

name: Bone
desc: One of Bazba's henchmen.

name: Bazba
desc: The leader of Bazba's bandits.

name: Saar
desc:
Commander of Grado's border guard.
His loyalty is unshakable.

name: Selena
desc: A general of Grado who is very loyal to the Emperor.

name: Vigarde
desc: The Emperor of Grado. Something seems off...

name: Caellach
desc: A General of Grado. Very ruthless and cunning.

name: Valter
desc: A General of Grado. Sadistic, and lives for the hunt.

name: Riev
desc: A General of Grado. Seems to hold a major grudge.

name: Lyon
desc: The prince of Grado. Seems to be in control?

name: Tirado
desc: General Grado's aide. He has utter confidence in his own ingenuity.

name: Zonta
desc: The leader of a mercenary band working in the pay of Tirado.

name: Novala
desc: An underling serving General Riev. He is a cowardly and ambitious schemer.

name: Murray
desc: A cavalier of Grado and a trusted confidant of Tirado.

name: Binks
desc: Leader of a band of mercenaries hired by an unknown agent.

name: Gheb
desc: A squad commander in Grado's army. He cares nothing for his men's lives.

name: Pablo
desc: A member of Carcino's Council of Elders and an advocate of Grado.

name: Beran
desc: A cavalier sworn in service to Grado. He serves as Valter's confidant.

name: Aias
desc: An aid to Grado's General Caellach. He believes he is an unbeatable tactician.

name: Carlyle
desc: Former leader of Jehanna's army. He lost himself for love of his queen.

name: Orson
desc: A former cavalier now serving Grado in hopes of restoring his dead wife.

name: Morva
desc: Leader of the Manakete tribe. He was turned into a draco zombie by Lyon.

name: Lyon
desc: A possessed Lyon. Wields might dark magic.

name: Hellhound
desc: A hound that has been experimented on for dark experiments. Is very friendly though. Portrait by Momin.

name: Bael
desc: An orphaned Bael. She seems to be tame and shy. Loves having her fur scratched. Portrait by AnOddDutchIntrovert.

name: Revenant
desc: A poor soul reanimated unto this husk. He still has the will to fight though. Portrait by SaintRubenio.

name: Mogall
desc: A mogall who seeks knowledge. His eyes are very perceptive. Portrait by L95.

name: Gargoyle
desc: A gentle gargoyle that desires to become beautiful and strong. She takes good care of her hair. Portrait by Mel.

name: Skeleton
desc: A dark soul that refused to die. He seeks for a way to return to life. Portrait by GenericPrestsel.

name: Tarvos
desc: The twisted result of monster experimentation. He fights to defend his supposed sister. Portrait by Eden.

name: Tarvadour
desc: The twisted result of monster experimentation. She finds purpose in healing others. Portrait by XPGamesNL.

name: Gorgon
desc: A beautiful Gorgon recently hatched from an egg. She also has a beautiful singing voice. Portrait by Sphealnuke.

name: Cyclops
desc: A cyclops that is the last of his tribe. Doesn't like seeing his friends being hurt. Portrait by L95.

name: Ismaire
desc: Queen of Jehanna

name: Mansel
desc: The Pontifex of Rausten and L'arachel's uncle.

name: Avatar
desc: An Einherjar summoned to fight for its master. Portrait by AmBrosiac.

name: Davius Old
desc: A boy enlisted for fame and glory. Empowered by a dream. Portrait by Zorua. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade

name: Moze
desc: A young man that travels as a vagabond. Holds a powerful secret. Portrait by Fenriel. Unit created by Xiakil

name: Pro
desc: Just your average overpowered Joe. Portrait by SatoshiKura. Unit created by ZeonBPM

name: Cucara
desc: A lumberjack from a small town. A lovely person made up of the hopes and dreams of six close friends. Portrait by Zess Dynamite. Unit created by Pew.

name: Scintilla
desc: A daring harpy who aims to be the best sky fighter. Looking for portrait creator. Unit created by Woods707

name: Bart
desc:
A mage from a village that knows secret serpentine magics.
Unit created by WiiSportsRemote

name: Arno
desc: A canine Einherjar. Gentle and affectionate, if meek. Can't remember her past. Unit and portrait created by MorganTheAce.

name: Lindsey
desc:
A genius shaman that delves into the research of monster transformation.
Portrait by VelvetKitsune, unit created by Woods707

name: Azuth
desc:
Mage that aspires to find the truth of magic, without caring how taboo that is.
Portrait by SacredStones_Shaman. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade

name: Alexander
desc:
A brave and intelligent hunter. Searching for a purpose.
Has a deep hatred of brigands. Portrait by Obsidian Daddy. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade.

name: Suu
desc: A peculiar slime with great ambitions. Highly adept with magic for its kind.

name: Diana
desc:
A street urchin raised under a thieves guild and formerly worked for it.
She is looking for wealth to help raise an orphanage.
Unit created by JRPthe2nd.

name: Jaffar
desc:
A legendary assassin who seeks to redeem himself with a dignified death.
Portrait by Eldritch Abomination.
Unit submitted by DaviusBlackBlade

name: Lyn
desc:
A young girl from the Lorca tribe. She is stouthearted and kind.
Portrait by MonkeyBard and Wasdye. Unit submitted by Rubeno

name: Tareon
desc:
A knight with a mysterious past. Doesn't open up to strangers.
Portrait by Miguel-Rojo. Unit created by Ackerman1313.

name: Atlas
desc:
One strong fighter who seeks a good cause. Is a protector above all else.
Portrait by Fenriel. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade.

name: Genji
desc:
A samurai who walks a lonely path. Lives in tormentn for failing to protect his lord.
Portrait by Zorua. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade.

name: Oliver
desc: A young man that grew up in a tribe of Fell Dragon worshippers. Portrait by MeatOfJustice. Unit submitted by T3rm1gn4rt0r.

name: Tyrande
desc:
A rare guardian of the forest that has come out from her sanctuary in search for adventure.
Unit and portrait created by Woods707

name: Jack
desc: A strange guy that dreams of wielding the ultimate weapon. Portait by Sme. Unit submitted by T3rm1gn4rt0r.

name: Jonathan
desc:
The old king's general who is bound by loyalty and duty. Unit by Machado De Assis.
Portrait by Machado De Assis and Momin.

name: Vespera
desc:
A mysterious, but kind woman. A fierce fighter on the battlefield.
Unit submitted by Xiakil. Portrait by Halone_Fenriel.

name: Fajar
desc: A young woman full of life. Unit and portrait submitted by Momin.

name: Wally
desc:
A snag who dreams of becoming a wall. Unit submitted by Pokeball97.
Temp. portrait by Dutch Introvert.

name: Eterna
desc:
A knight from a land between realms. Accustomed to difficult battles and struggle, but rather shy in conversations. 
Portrait spliced from MeatofJustice & TrezVG. Unit created by Pew.
portrait_nid: Lin Eterna V3 (Spliced from{MeatofJustice}F2E OC 25 and{TrezVG}Hatsune Miku)

name: Andre
desc:
A Legendary Forgemaster seeking to write his family's legacy into history.
Portrait by Fenriel. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade.

name: Vector
desc:
A retainer of the grey knights,with no clue of how he came to Magvel. 
His insticts tell him to hunt demons.
Portrait by Sterling Glovner. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade.

name: Claude
desc: Prince of Almyra and future leader of the Leicester Alliance. Portrait by Melia and CranJam. Unit submitted by T3rm1gn4rt0r.

name: Tanaka
desc:
An ordinary guy transported from other world for unknown reason.
Portrait by CranJam, Roxannity, Sterling Glovner. 
Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade

name: Esperanza
desc: A young mercernary looking for glory. Determined to become a bladeswomen known by all. Portait by Corninin, spliced from Sphealnuke, Thorn VelvetKistune, and Levin64. Unit by Pew.

name: Garmr
desc:
The Guardian of Hell. He is trapped in the mortal plane.
Portrait by Fenriel. Unit submitted by T3rm1gn4rt0r.

name: Davius
desc: A fighter seeking to fill his emptiness, only fragmented memories remain. Portrait by Zorua. Unit created by DaviusBlackBlade

name: Plushie
desc: Plushie

name: Test
desc: Test dummy for tryng things, do not delete
